title: Republican Union Party (Spain)
text:
The Republican Union Party (, PUR) was a <a href="List%20of%20political%20parties%20in%20Spain">Spanish</a> <a href="Republicanism">republican</a> party founded in 1903 by <a href="Nicol%C3%A1s%20Salmer%C3%B3n%20y%20Alonso">Nicolás Salmerón y Alonso</a>.
It participated in the <a href="Spanish%20general%20election%2C%201903">1903</a>, <a href="Spanish%20general%20election%2C%201905">1905</a> and <a href="Spanish%20general%20election%2C%201907">1907 general elections</a>. It was dissolved in 1910, being succeeded by the <a href="Republican%20Nationalist%20Federal%20Union">Republican Nationalist Federal Union</a>.
